Key Match Events: Bhuvneshwar Kumar bowled a good length delivery that hit Temba Bavuma on his shoulder before deflecting onto his helmet.
Temba Bavuma was forced to retire hurt after the blow.
India set a challenging target of 170 against South Africa in the fourth T20I of the five-match series.
South Africa got off to a steady start, scoring 20/0 at the end of three overs.
